Ashley Walters bụ onye na-ese ihe na South Africa nke na-arụ ọrụ foto na ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Walters na 1983 na Uitsig, mpaghara Cape Town, kilomita isii n'ebe ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Cape Town International Airport.
N'afọ 1991, otu enyi ezinụlọ nke na-ese foto ihe omume obodo mere ka Walters mara foto
N'afọ 1996, Walters nwetara igwefoto ihe nkiri 35 mm mbụ ya
Ozugbo Walters nwetara kọmputa na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, nnwale na njikwa  oyiyi dijitalụ ga-ekwe omume
Walters malitere guba akwụkwọ n'afọ 2000 na ụlọ akwụkwọ St
Andrews High School tupu ọ gaa azụmaahịa na kọleji
O nwetara BA na Fine Art (2011) site na Mahadum nke Cape Town's Michaelis School of Fine Art
Walters na-eme afọ nke abụọ nke MA na Fine Art na Michaelis ugbu a.
Ọrụ ya "Na-agbanye gburugburu usoro nke nhazi mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya ma na-enyocha mmekọrịta dị n'etiti ihe owuwu mmekọrịta mmadụ na eze na oghere".
Ọrụ ya bụ Xray (2009), Fear (2009), Malawi (2010), Uitsig (2010) na Dark City (2011).
2013: Research Fellow: Centre for Curating the Archive, Mahadum nke Cape Town.
